content.raw:
It looks like UNIT_SensorManager_TEST [started failing at the same time](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/%28root%29/UNIT_SensorManager_TEST/test_ran/). It's failing during the Subscriber teardown.
~~~

[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.188
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:146] ServerFixture load in 3.5 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
Done done
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:97] ServerFixture::Unload
